required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study to Assess the Bioequivalence of Fixed Dose Combination of HR20033 Relative to Co-administration of the Individual Components in Healthy Chinese Subjects
clinical_study.official_title: A Single-centre, Parallel-cohort, Randomized, Open-label, Two-period, Cross-over, Bioequivalence Study of the Fixed Dose Combination of HR20033 Relative to Co-administration of the Individual Components in Two Cohorts of Healthy Chinese Subjects in the Fed State

brief_summary.textblock:
The trial is to assess the bioequivalence between HR20033 FDC tablet and co-administration of SHR3824 tablets and metformin XR tablets.
The primary objective is to evaluate bioequivalence of SHR3824 and Metformin in healthy Chinese subjects in the fed state.
The secondary objective is to evaluate the safety of HR20033 FDC tablet in healthy Chinese subjects.

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: There will be two independent cohorts of subjects who will each receive two treatments (high dose strength and low dose strength), and each treatment will be followed by 72 hours of blood sampling for pharmacokinetic assessments, with safety and tolerability. In each cohort approximately 40 healthy subjects will be randomized to receive treatment with IP to complete at least 36 evaluable subjects.

primary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics parameters of SHR3824 and Metformin in the fasted and fed state: Cmax
primary_outcome.time_frame: Based on pre-dose, 0.5-72 hours post-dose sampling times on Day 1 and Day 8

primary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics parameters of SHR3824 and Metformin in the fasted and fed state: AUC0-t
primary_outcome.time_frame: Based on pre-dose, 0.5-72 hours post-dose sampling times on Day 1 and Day 8

primary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics parameters of SHR3824 and Metformin in the fasted and fed state: AUC0-inf (if applicable)
primary_outcome.time_frame: Based on pre-dose, 0.5-72 hours post-dose sampling times on Day 1 and Day 8

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics parameters of SHR3824 and Metformin in the fasted and fed state: Tmax
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Based on pre-dose, 0.5-72 hours post-dose sampling times on Day 1 and Day 8

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics parameters of SHR3824 and Metformin in the fasted and fed state: Vz/F
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Based on pre-dose, 0.5-72 hours post-dose sampling times on Day 1 and Day 8

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics parameters of SHR3824 and Metformin in the fasted and fed state: CL/F
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Based on pre-dose, 0.5-72 hours post-dose sampling times on Day 1 and Day 8

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics parameters of SHR3824 and Metformin in the fasted and fed state: t1/2
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Based on pre-dose, 0.5-72 hours post-dose sampling times on Day 1 and Day 8

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics parameters of SHR3824 and Metformin after single and multiple dose: Tmax
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Based on pre-dose, 0.5-72 hours post-dose sampling times on Day 1 and Day 8

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics parameters of SHR3824 and Metformin after single and multiple dose: Ctrough
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Based on pre-dose, 0.5-72 hours post-dose sampling times on Day 1 and Day 8

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics parameters of SHR3824 and Metformin after single and multiple dose: Racc etc
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Based on pre-dose, 0.5-72 hours post-dose sampling times on Day 1 and Day 8

secondary_outcome.measure: The incidence and severity of adverse events/serious adverse events
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Based on pre-dose, 0.5-72 hours post-dose sampling times on Day 1 and Day 8

intervention.intervention_name: T1: FDC 5/500 mg; R1+R: SHR3824 5 mg + Metformin 500 mg XR
intervention.description: SHR3824 5 mg + Metformin 500 mg XR In cohort 1 (low dose strength), subjects will receive treatment T1 followed by 7 days washout and then receive treatment R1+R.

intervention.intervention_name: T1: FDC 5/500 mg; R1+R: SHR3824 5 mg + Metformin 500 mg XR
intervention.description: SHR3824 5 mg + Metformin 500 mg XR In cohort 1 (low dose strength), subjects will receive treatment R1+R followed by 7 days washout and then receive treatment T1.

intervention.intervention_name: T2: FDC 5/1000 mg; R2+R: SHR3824 5 mg + two Metformin 500 mg XR
intervention.description: SHR3824 5 mg + Metformin 1000 mg XR In cohort 2 (high dose strength), subjects will receive treatment T2 followed by 7 days washout and then receive treatment R2+R.

intervention.intervention_name: T2: FDC 5/1000 mg; R2+R: SHR3824 5 mg + two Metformin 500 mg XR
intervention.description: SHR3824 5 mg + Metformin 1000 mg XR In cohort 2 (high dose strength), subjects will receive treatment R2+R followed by 7 days washout and then receive treatment T2.
